title: Genes that evolve from scratch expand protein diversity

title_detail.value: Genes that evolve from scratch expand protein diversity

summary: A new study challenges one of the classic assumptions about how new proteins evolve. The research shows that random, noncoding sections of DNA can quickly evolve to produce new proteins.

summary_detail.value: A new study challenges one of the classic assumptions about how new proteins evolve. The research shows that random, noncoding sections of DNA can quickly evolve to produce new proteins.
